title: Trump Pressures Broadcasters Over Critical Coverage, Escalating Attack on Speech
summary: The president’s suggestion that broadcasters should lose their licenses because of criticism of him indicated that his assault on critics’ language is driven in part by personal animus.

title: Disney Pulled Jimmy Kimmel as Pressure Built on Multiple Fronts
summary: The abrupt programming decision quickly morphed into a flashpoint for free speech in America under the Trump administration.

title: RFK Jr.’s Vaccine Committee to Vote on Hepatitis B and Covid Shots
summary: The members voted against the combination shot for measles, mumps, rubella and chickenpox. Guidelines on vaccines given separately to prevent those infections remain unchanged.

title: Can Trump Actually Designate Antifa a Terrorist Group? Here Are the Facts.
summary: The president made the same declaration in 2020, but nothing came of it. His new declaration came amid broader threats against liberals after the Charlie Kirk killing.

title: Trump Asks Supreme Court to Allow Removal of Fed Governor
summary: President Trump had pressed to fire Lisa Cook before the central bank’s meeting, at which the Fed voted to cut interest rates.

title: Why Obesity Is Killing American Men
summary: Men seek weight loss treatment far less often than women. Doctors are concerned.

title: What Does It Take to Get Men to See a Doctor?
summary: Men in the United States live around five years less than women. One clinic is trying to persuade men that getting checked out could save their life.

title: Texas A&M President to Step Down After Controversy Over ‘Gender Ideology’
summary: The university had been roiled after a student filmed herself arguing with the instructor of a children’s literature course that recognized more than two genders.

title: Trump and Xi Set to Finalize TikTok Deal
summary: The two leaders are expected to speak Friday to discuss a deal to keep the wildly popular app from going dark in the United States.

title: Elon Musk Has Focused on xAI Since Leaving Washington
summary: Mr. Musk spent the summer at his artificial intelligence start-up xAI, trying to match the runaway success of OpenAI. The result was chaos.

title: Flattery and Flourish for Trump. For His U.K. Hosts, Relief at Avoiding Strife.
summary: The president was feted by King Charles III with the sort of pageantry he covets, signed a technology deal and steered clear of big disagreements with Prime Minister Keir Starmer.

title: At U.K. Leader’s Country House, Trump’s State Visit Gets a Little More Political
summary: Photographs of the pomp and spectacle of the U.S. president’s second state visit to Britain.

title: Melania Trump Wears Leather and Suede on Tour With Queen Camilla
summary: On day two of the state visit to Britain, the first lady opted for leather and suede.

title: A Domestic Violence Case in Rural Pennsylvania Ended in a Deadly Ambush
summary: Three police officers were killed and two others were injured in York County after encountering a man who was suspected of stalking a former girlfriend.

title: 11 Elected Officials Arrested While Trying to Access Cells at N.Y.C. ICE Facility
summary: Brad Lander, the city comptroller, was arrested again. Jumaane D. Williams, the public advocate, was among protesters detained outside.

title: Takeaways from ‘107 Days,’ Kamala Harris’s New Book
summary: In her book, coming out next week, she revisited her breakneck campaign, explaining her choices and outlining missteps — of hers and others. She hinted at a return to politics.

title: Book Review: ‘107 Days,’ by Kamala Harris
summary: The new memoir by the former vice president defends her campaign and allows others to criticize Joe Biden and his team for her failure to win.

title: Marilyn Hagerty, Whose Olive Garden Review Went Viral, Dies at 99
summary: “The chicken Alfredo ($10.95) was warm and comforting on a cold day,” she wrote from North Dakota. And suddenly the national media made her a celebrity.

title: The Era of Dark Passions
summary: Leaders across the political spectrum have figured out how easily they can motivate people with anger, fear and domination.

title: A Leaderless and Connected Gen Z Is Taking Over in Asia
summary: A leaderless, connected and powerful Gen Z is rewriting Asia’s political playbook.

title: California Is So Muggy This Week That It Feels Like Florida
summary: The remnants of a tropical storm are bringing thunderstorms, rain and humidity, none of which are normal for this time of year.

title: What to Know About the North American Summit Taking Place Without the U.S.
summary: Looming over the discussions was the desire to preserve the countries’ free-trade agreement with the United States.

title: So a Bear Walks Into a New Jersey Dollar Store …
summary: It happened in New Jersey, it was no joke, and it did not end well for the bear.
